title: Enhance Bio/Profile Animations, Update Bio Contact & Content, Replace Pink Text Colors, and Add Rating Prompt on Close

requirements.text: Improve the Branch Postmaster bio/profile overlay animation quality and overall feel (open/close transitions, overlay glow, and typewriter reveal) to look smoother and more premium without removing existing interactions (tap/close sounds, click-to-open, backdrop close).

quotes: bio profile animation ko or better karo

acceptanceCriteria: Opening the profile overlay animates in smoothly (no abrupt appearance) and closing animates out smoothly.
Existing behaviors still work: click card opens; close button, backdrop click, and keyboard interactions still close; click/close sounds still play.
Typewriter text animation remains readable and does not jitter or reflow excessively while typing.

requirements.text: Update the bio/profile contact number shown inside the profile details to use exactly: 7771991108 (including removing any masked placeholder like '+91-XXXX-XXXXXX').
acceptanceCriteria: The profile details (typewriter biodata) displays '7771991108' as the contact number.
No masked placeholder contact number remains in the profile overlay content.

requirements.text: Rewrite and expand the bio/profile text content to better present the person as an IPPB expert and someone who explains insurance clearly, with a friendly and helpful tone (English text). This includes updating both the typed biodata lines and the additional descriptive paragraph in the profile overlay.

quotes: karo bio deta better karo ippb expert insorance explain better good person friendly etc.

acceptanceCriteria: Profile overlay text is in English and clearly communicates: IPPB expertise, ability to explain insurance, and a friendly/helpful personality.
Both the typewriter lines and the longer paragraph are updated accordingly (not only one section).

requirements.text: Replace all UI text that is currently styled as pink (including pink gradients and pink-highlight labels) so it uses a live animated color treatment based on blue, yellow, and black (no pink). Apply this to existing pink text styles used across the app (e.g., pink bolt/result text, pink/blue gradient text, and IPPB pink/gold labels) while keeping readability on the dark background.

quotes: All text jo pink hai inhe blue,yellow,black live animation mai karo

acceptanceCriteria: No prominent text in the UI appears pink anymore (including gradient text that previously contained pink).
Formerly-pink highlighted text uses an animated blue/yellow/black treatment and remains readable against the dark theme.
IPPB highlight labels that used the pink/gold style are updated to the new non-pink animated style.

requirements.text: When the user closes the bio/profile overlay, show a rating prompt (e.g., 1–5 stars) and capture the rating so it is visible to the user afterward (e.g., show the submitted rating confirmation and the last submitted rating). Persist the submitted rating in the backend so it can be retrieved later.

quotes: close karne per raiting aane chaiye jo mujhe pata lag jana chaiye

acceptanceCriteria: Closing the profile overlay triggers a rating prompt UI.
After submission, the app clearly shows the submitted rating to the user (e.g., 'Thanks — you rated 4/5' and/or 'Last rating: 4/5').
Rating is persisted via backend calls and can be fetched again after a page refresh.

requirements.text: Extend the Motoko backend (single main actor) with stable storage and methods to record submitted profile ratings and to fetch the most recent rating and basic summary (at minimum: last rating value and timestamp).

quotes: raiting ... mujhe pata lag jana chaiye

acceptanceCriteria: Backend provides a method to submit a rating (1–5) and stores it in stable state.
Backend provides a method to fetch the last submitted rating (and timestamp).
Invalid ratings outside 1–5 are rejected with a clear error.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only shadcn components); compose them instead.
Do not edit immutable hook files: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; add migration.mo only if needed for stable state upgrades.
nonGoals: Do not add third-party authentication providers (only Internet Identity is supported).
Do not add external databases or non-Motoko backend services.
